articles.title: Marmosets Prefer It When Another Monkey Shows an Interest in Helping Others - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Like humans, marmosets – tiny monkeys with Einstein-like ear tufts native to Brazil – eavesdrop on conversations between others, and prefer to approach individuals they view positively, a study in the journal Science Advances showed Wednesday.
